articles.content:
Check out the release date trailer for Those Who Remain, the first-person psychological horror game being released on May 28 for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC via Steam. A Nintendo Switch version is due out this Summer.

articles.description: The MacBook Air (2020) is the cheapest laptop that Apple makes, but it's surprisngly well appointed, and a solid machine for basic computing needs.

articles.title: With real theaters closed, actors are turning to virtual reality - CNET
articles.description: The Under Presents is part game, part immersive theater. Its performers have been living virtually for months, paving a way for where all of us may be heading.
articles.content:
The Under Presents has been running for months. It's a model for where virtual theater could evolve.
Tender Claws
